attributes.action: put alcohol and tobacco to class A simply because they are more harmful than cannabis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
if cannabis is going to CLASS B then alcohol and tobacco are more harmful than cannabis so we petition you gordon brown to put them where they belong CLASS (A) DRUGS or LEGALISE CANNABIS the less harmful substance.
also peanuts kills 6 people every year in the uk so shall we ban them too?
its about time our goverment used a scientific based A,B,C Misuse of Drugs Act system and not what suits them,as it stands the A,B,C system is not fit for purpose.alcohol aint for everyone people have a choice to take a less harmful drug compared to the more damaging drug alcohol,anyone taking EQUAL or LESS HARMFUL than the drugs the goverment is selling shouldnt be discriminated against and that is pure arbitrary and against the law...
